channel.title: Signature request
channel.description:
So this is sort of an odd theme I know but I've been trying to get it for a while.
Here is the basic idea
-any signature size will do -colors: more darksih is preferred -theme: image of harry potter and an image of a quest cape emote sort of combined? ( like I said weird I know ) -Text : Mod X < -- line 1 The time has now < --- line 2

item.title: Signature request
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

Here is something.

I put “the time is now” because that is what i thought you meant… if you want “the time are now” then just tell me.

Read full topic
